I think I have just the right movie for you! Have you considered "Hotel Rwanda"? It's a powerful and emotional film that tells the true story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who risked his life to protect over a thousand refugees during the Rwandan genocide. With an all-star cast including Don Cheadle and Nick Nolte, it's a must-see for anyone interested in history and human drama.

Alternatively, if you're looking for something a bit more action-packed, "The Monuments Men" could be right up your alley! This World War II thriller stars George Clooney, Matt Damon, and Bill Murray as an unlikely team of art historians and museum curators who embark on a daring mission to rescue priceless artworks from the clutches of the Nazis.
